targets.Name: AllObjects
postText: Wow! We talked all about staying safe in the car. Now let’s talk about something else next.

What does this look like? It’s a brain! It's very important that we keep our brain safe. How do we protect our brain? By wearing a helmet! Let’s look at ways to keep our brain safe when we’re riding our bikes and scooters!
targets.hint: I'm soft but shed all over
Text: FURRY PET (Ex: Dogs, Cats, Hamsters, Guinea Pigs, and Rabbits) are common pet allergens that can trigger asthma symptoms in some people.Pet hair and dander, especially cat hair, can fly in the air and land on surfaces throughout the house...
